scripts.build:codec: rm -f dist/* && docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/../../:/src emscripten/emsdk  em++ --bind --std=c++17 -O3 -s WASM=1 -Isrc/ --pre-js ./packages/example-webpack4-js/prefix-node-require.js --js-library ./src/mylibrary_web_exports.js -s ASSERTIONS=1  -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap", "ccall", "UTF8ToString", "stringToUTF8", "intArrayFromString", "ALLOC_NORMAL", "allocate", "AsciiToString"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s 'EXPORT_NAME="mylibrary_raw_lib"'  -o ./packages/example-webpack4-js/build/mylibrary_raw_lib.js  ./src/mylibrary.cpp
scripts.build: npm run build:codec && npm run build:bundle
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
